author: JumpingYang001
body:
When I run "apt-get install dotnet=1.0.0.001718-1", it shows
root@st-ub14x64-01  # apt-get install dotnet=1.0.0.001718-1
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree  
Reading state information... Done
E: Version '1.0.0.001718-1' for 'dotnet' was not found

BTW, I can install "apt-get install dotnet=1.0.0.001675-1".

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Ah, yeah. Sorry I accidentally bumped the version in the readme. Their feed is out of date, see dotnet/cli#1839. It should be fixed really soon.

title: "E: Version '1.0.0.001718-1' for 'dotnet' was not found" when install dotnet=1.0.0.001718-1
